pullrequest.title: Process insertions and deletions on gz log echo - fix issue #2136

content.raw:
Fixed on e406af0. Now:

* Model insertion is processed without warnings or duplications
* Light insertion and deletion are also processed. 
    * Requires [this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/325/support-light-insertion-in-state/diff) sdformat pull request.
    * Test has been adapted to handle that as well
* The `WorldState::insertions` vector keeps model or light SDF descriptions in string format without being wrapped in an `<sdf>` tag
    * Some expectations on `INTEGRATION_physics::StateInsertion` have been adapted to handle that
* Also made sure there are `<name>` tags inside `<deletions>`
content.html:
Fixed on e406af0. Now:

  • Model insertion is processed without warnings or duplications
  • Light insertion and deletion are also processed.
    • Requires this sdformat pull request.
    • Test has been adapted to handle that as well
  • The WorldState::insertions vector keeps model or light SDF descriptions in string format without being wrapped in an <sdf> tag
    • Some expectations on INTEGRATION_physics::StateInsertion have been adapted to handle that
  • Also made sure there are <name> tags inside <deletions>
